Sentencas: The hybrid direct carbon fuel cell is a direct carbon fuel cell concept that combines a solid oxide fuel cell with a molten carbonate fuel cell electrode.
Titulo: Development of tubular hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: This offers efficient conversion of coal or biomass derived carbons to electricity.
Titulo: Development of tubular hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study we aim to improve the electrical performance of this cell by using gadolinia doped ceria (GDC) as either a protection layer over a YSZ electrolyte or as the electrolyte itself.
Titulo: Development of tubular hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: In our study, the electrical performance of several tubular cell geometries were investigated using impedance spectroscopy both with and without gas flows of carbon dioxide or nitrogen.
Titulo: Development of tubular hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: Integrity of microstructure including possible layer delamination effects were investigated by SEM.
Titulo: Development of tubular hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: Promising values of power and resistance were observed using a GDC material as electrolyte at intermediate temperature reducing the operation temperature compared to YSZ, doubling the power of each cell.
Titulo: Development of tubular hybrid direct carbon fuel cell
